description:
A giant ogre appears in the mountains to the north. His name is Kyokotsu. Kyokotsu eats demons when he can. He attacks the demon wolf tribe. Koga sees Imawa, an old wolf become seriously injured.
Source: hulu

titles.title: El espíritu que atacó al clan lobo
O líder dos youkais lobos é atacado por um zombi
亡霊に襲われた妖狼族
